about_the_game:
The Level 3 Mastery Pack is designed for capsuleers looking to push their limits. With 2 months of Omega time for uninterrupted progress, 500 PLEX for trade and customization, and a Graduate Bundle packed with 750,000 SP and two Specialist ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerators, this pack ensures you’re always one step ahead. 

Contents: 

  • 2 months Omega 

  • 500 PLEX 

  • Graduate Bundle (750,000 SP + 2 Specialist ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerators) 

Single purchase per account.

The Level 3 Mastery Pack is designed for capsuleers looking to push their limits. With 2 months of Omega time for uninterrupted progress, 500 PLEX for trade and customization, and a Graduate Bundle packed with 750,000 SP and two Specialist ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerators, this pack ensures you’re always one step ahead. 

Contents: 

  • 2 months Omega 

  • 500 PLEX 

  • Graduate Bundle (750,000 SP + 2 Specialist ‘Boost’ Cerebral Accelerators) 

Single purchase per account.

package_groups.title: Buy EVE Online: Level 3 Mastery pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB or higher
  • Video: AMD Radeon 5450 or NVIDIA GeForce 420 or better with at least 1024 MB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700 or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 @ 3.6 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB or greater
  • Video: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 580 or better with at least 4 GB VRAM

short_description: Accelerate your training and expand your reach with 2 months of Omega, 500 PLEX, and 750,000 SP. Maximize your efficiency and unlock new opportunities in New Eden.

English*, German*, Russian*, French*, Korean*, Japanese*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
